_header: It is known in every shire
Subjects: tongue, destructive power of; carols, of moral counsel
_description: On the evil wrought by ‘wekyd tongges’ — five quatrains (aaab) and burden: ‘A man that con his tong stere / He ther not rek wer that he go’

BodEngPoete1.First Lines:
Ittes knowyn in euery schyreWekyd tongges haue no
                    per…
BodEngPoete1.Last Lines:
…þat we mut se hys glorius faceamen amen for
                    charyte
